element.definition: The PT test evaluates the extrinsic and common pathways of the coagulation cascade.
element.comments: Used to screen the integrity of the extrinsic and common pathways of coagulation and to monitor warfarin anticoagulation.
element.requirements: This test is orderable. A plasma specimen in a 3.2% sodium citrate blue top tube is required.

fhir_comments: Is this the FHIR datatype for the observation? ( ie the datatype when ordering the test) or the Result? ( ie. numeric, codeable concept or text for lab tests )
